query: SELECT a.id as account_id, a.name as account_name, a.plan_key, a.status as account_status, s.id as sub_id, s.subPlanId, s.subStatus, s.subBillingCycle, p.name as plan_name, p.plan_key as plan_plan_key FROM accounts a LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON s.subAccountId = a.id LEFT JOIN plans p ON p.id = s.subPlanId;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2U3q1dt8GKGPLLB.root --database WN9ut9YEufdDjevBezkAVQ --execute SELECT a.id as account_id, a.name as account_name, a.plan_key, a.status as account_status, s.id as sub_id, s.subPlanId, s.subStatus, s.subBillingCycle, p.name as plan_name, p.plan_key as plan_plan_key FROM accounts a LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON s.subAccountId = a.id LEFT JOIN plans p ON p.id = s.subPlanId;
